fields.name: Abilites:
fields.value: - Each night, you may visit and plant a Cherry Bomb on someone's house. The player will be roleblocked (With a warning that the Cherry Bomb was planted)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - There is a 25% chance that the player gets roleblocked for 2 nights, a 12.5% chance they get roleblocked for 3 nights, and so on so forth.
